name: Sharks! In Space?!
description:
I don't know how sharks survive in space, but it's your job to stop them!

The objective is simple.... blow up as many sharks as you can before they get you!

Controls:

Thrusters: W / Up Arrow

Rotate Ship: A and D / Left and Right arrows

Shoot: Space / Enter / Ctrl

Pause/Menu: Escape

Toggle Fullscreen: F11

Zoom In/Out: Q / E   

Experimental Xbox 360 Controller Support (Windows):

Thrusters: Left Stick

Rotate: Right Stick

Shoot: RT

Pause: Start

Zoom In/Out: LB/RB

Written in Go using Ebiten.

I started the jam late, but would like to keep adding to this project. Claymation games are a lot of fun and I would love to expand this beyond just the jam concept.
